person.persName: Sebastian Eifort (Carter County, Kentucky, furnace owner and state representative)

body.p: Carter County Kentucky, furnace owner and state representative. Neustadt, Germany native. Son of Henry Eifort and Catherine Eifort. Married to Rachel Jackson Eifort on March 17, 1842. Father of William H. Eifort, James M. Eifort, Catherine Eifort, Mary J. Eifort, Sebastian Eifort, and Joseph Eifort. Worked at Jackson, Scioto, and Bloom furnaces in Scioto County, Ohio in 1839. Co-founded Harrison Furnace in Scioto County in 1852. Built and owned Boone Furnace in Carter County, Kentucky from 1856 to 1866. Served in the Kentucky state legislature from 1863.
